A4.text: He was known for playing the villain King Tut in the television series Batman (1966–1968).

A5.text: David Wayne portrayed Jervis Tetch / The Mad Hatter in the Batman television series (1966–1968).

A6.text: Roddy McDowall was not credited as the actor for the Mad Hatter in the Batman television series.
